item.description:
Hi Personal Growth Seekers!

From the past 2 events I've mentioned Landmark Education and many of you have been interested in hearing more about it. So due to popular demand, I'll be hosting an introduction to Landmark Education next Friday at 6:30pm at the Landmark Education center in Quincy.

I know this meetup is about "Cocktails" and conversations however I'm unable to serve alcohol at the Landmark office. I will however provide tea, coffee and water.

6:15pm - Meet and Greet
6:30pm - Introduction to Landmark Education Workshop
item.name: Introduction to Landmark Education
